title.narrative: Implementation of Eco-industrial Park Initiative for Sustainable Industrial Zones in Viet Nam

description.narrative: The project aims to tackle the issue of unsustainable industrial growth, MPI and UNIDO jointly developed a project with the objective to introduce and implement an eco-industrial park (EIP) management system to reduce and/or eliminate GHG, water consumption, water pollution, POPs and other chemicals of global concern and to demonstrate innovative clean & low-carbon technologies and practices in industries.
